com.scvngr.levelup.core.service

Class AbstractNetworkRequestService

  • java.lang.Object
    • IntentService
      • com.scvngr.levelup.core.service.AbstractNetworkRequestService
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SilentNetworkRequestService

    @LevelUpApi(contract=INTERNAL)
public abstract class AbstractNetworkRequestService
extends IntentService
    Abstract base class to be used for services that do network requests in the background and may or may not want to send results back to the clients that triggered the request. Subclasses should make sure that any requests to start this service include a unique token passed in EXTRA_STRING_TOKEN. Subclasses may override getRequest(Intent) to not require a request to be passed in the start Intent.

    • Field Detail

      • ACTION_REQUEST_FINISHED

        public static final java.lang.String ACTION_REQUEST_FINISHED
        Intent action broadcast via LocalBroadcastManager when the service completes its work.

        The Intent will contain EXTRA_PARCELABLE_RESPONSE, EXTRA_STRING_TOKEN, and EXTRA_BOOLEAN_IS_REQUEST_SUCCESSFUL.

      • EXTRA_PARCELABLE_RESPONSE

        public static final java.lang.String EXTRA_PARCELABLE_RESPONSE
        Type: Response.

        Key mapping to a response from the request the service performed.

      • EXTRA_STRING_TOKEN

        public static final java.lang.String EXTRA_STRING_TOKEN
        Type: String.

        Key mapping to a token uniquely identifying the original request to the service.

      • EXTRA_BOOLEAN_IS_REQUEST_SUCCESSFUL

        public static final java.lang.String EXTRA_BOOLEAN_IS_REQUEST_SUCCESSFUL
        Type: boolean.

        Key mapping to a boolean indicating whether the request was successful (e.g. the response doesn't contain an error).
